About Me

A little bit about me!

BIO

Front-End Developer

I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser. My most recent projects have been built using Ruby on rails, which have included an array of languages, inluding my latest language Sass, which is a quicker and more elegant extension to css

Designer

My usual routine consists of doing a rough mock-up in either wireframes or keynote. If I'm happy with the layout I'll bring it to life in using Photshop
